main event: On December 25, 1954, in Glassboro, Massachusetts, a civilian reported observing 2 green, round objects for 3-5 seconds, which were concluded to be astronomical in nature, specifically meteors.
interesting points: The observation lasted only 3-5 seconds, indicating a brief but clear sighting.
The report mentions the absence of photographs and physical evidence.
The objects were described as round and green in color with a very short tail.
The conclusion was that the objects were astronomical, specifically identified as meteors.
The report is from Project Blue Book, a U.S. Air Force program that investigated UFOs.
